snippet.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Official Weapon: Heavy Bolter Trailer
snippet.description:
Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 is an action-adventure third-person shooter developed by Saber Interactive. Don't miss the latest trailer going over a new weapon to wield called the Heavy Bolter. Players will be able to inflict the Emperor’s wrath upon the enemies of the Imperium with the Heavy Bolter often used to support infantry. Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 launches on September 9 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#Warhammer40KSpaceMarine2 #IGN #Gaming
